pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Toolkit for Statistical Analysis of Single-Cell Omics Data // A suite of statistical methods for analysis of single-cell omics data including linear model-based methods for differential abundance analysis for individual level single-cell RNA-seq data. For more details see Zhang, et al. (Submitted to Bioinfor matics)https://github.com/Lujun995/DiSC_Replication_Code.
